Guillermo del Toro presents ' Mama' , a supernatural thriller that tells the chilling story of two girls who disappeared in the woods the same day her mother was killed . They are rescued years later and begin a new life, but they discover that someone or something still wants arroparlas night.

When the impossible happens and girls appear in a crumbling cabin , the couple begins to wonder if anyone else has come home accompanying girls.
